claims.claim: Domestic violence surged during COVID-19 due to increased pressures within households.
claims.quote: Domestic violence to me, like during covid 19...The real monsters came out in the homes.

claims.claim: Society failed to respond adequately to the rise in domestic violence during COVID-19.
claims.quote: So many people got killed during them couple of years, and it was no outcry for that.

claims.claim: The public's response to domestic violence incidents is influenced by the victim's race and societal status.
claims.quote: Normally be black and brown females, they don't start caring until it's in their community...had she just been another African American female, she wouldn't have got that much coverage.

claims.claim: Victims of domestic violence lack sufficient safe spaces to seek help.
claims.quote: You need avenues to get out and we don't allow victims enough space to feel safe enough to trust us as a society to be transparent enough to say, I need help.
